caserequest:CalendarEventTimeRange.description: A filter criterion for calendar events. If present, the response should only include calendar events that fall between the from and to dates and times.

caserequest:CaseQueryCriteria.description: Criteria limiting the case information to be returned.

caserequest:CaseQueryCriteriaType.description: Criteria limiting the list of cases to be returned.

caserequest:CalendarEventTimeRange.description: A filter criterion for calendar events. If present, the response should only include calendar events that fall between the from and to dates and times.

caserequest:DocketEntryTimeRange.description: A filter criterion for docket entries. If present, the response should only include docket entries that fall between the from and to dates and times.

caserequest:DocketEntryTypeCodeFilterTex.description: Filter criterion indicating that only docket entries of a specified type are being requested.

caserequest:IncludeCalendarEventIndicato.description: Indicates whether requester wishes calendar event information to be included in the response.

caserequest:IncludeDocketEntryIndicator.description: Indicates whether requester wishes docket entry information to be included in the response.

caserequest:IncludeParticipantsIndicator.description: Indicates whether requester wishes participant information to be included in the response.

ecf:CourtEventTypeCode.description: Filter criterion indicating that only calendar entries of a specified type are being requested.

j:CaseNumberText.description: An identifying number for a case that this activity is a part of, where the case number belongs to the agency that owns the activity information.

caserequest:DocketEntryTimeRange.description: A filter criterion for docket entries. If present, the response should only include docket entries that fall between the from and to dates and times.

caserequest:DocketEntryTypeCodeFilterTex.description: Filter criterion indicating that only docket entries of a specified type are being requested.

caserequest:GetCaseRequestMessage.description: A message requesting a case from a court case management information system conforming to the parameter or parameters identified in the message.

caserequest:GetCaseRequestMessageType.description: A message requesting a case from a court case management information system conforming to the parameter or parameters identified in the message.

caserequest:CaseQueryCriteria.description: Criteria limiting the case information to be returned.

ecf:DocumentAugmentation.description: The pleading, motion or order that is the main document in a Filing. A Document may have Connected Documents, which are appendices or exhibits that are intended for filing only in the context of the Lead Document.

ecf:SendingMDELocationID.description: Location for the MDE to which asynchronous and service messages can be sent. This unique location is self-assigned by the MDE.

ecf:ServiceInteractionProfileCode.description: An identifier, from a list of allowed values defined in the Court Filing specification, of a message profile supported by this court.

j:CaseCourt.description: A court of law in which the case is being tried.

nc:DocumentCategoryText.description: A kind of document; a nature or genre of the content.

nc:DocumentDescriptionText.description: A description of the content of a document.

nc:DocumentEffectiveDate.description: A date in which the content or action becomes enforceable, active, or effective.

nc:DocumentFileControlID.description: An identifier assigned to a document to locate it within a file control system.

nc:DocumentFiledDate.description: A date a document was officially filed with an organization or agency.

nc:DocumentIdentification.description: An identification that references a document.

nc:DocumentInformationCutOffDate.description: A date after which contributions to the content of a document will no longer be accepted.

nc:DocumentLanguageCode.description: A language of the content of the resource.

nc:DocumentPostDate.description: A date a document is entered or posted to an information system or network; used when the date of posting is different from the date on which a document was officially filed.

nc:DocumentReceivedDate.description: A date a transmitted document was received.

nc:DocumentSequenceID.description: An identifier that determines the document order in a set of related documents.

nc:DocumentSoftwareName.description: A name of a computer application used to process a document.

nc:DocumentSubmitter.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

nc:DocumentTitleText.description: A name given to a document.

caserequest:IncludeCalendarEventIndicato.description: Indicates whether requester wishes calendar event information to be included in the response.

caserequest:IncludeDocketEntryIndicator.description: Indicates whether requester wishes docket entry information to be included in the response.

caserequest:IncludeParticipantsIndicator.description: Indicates whether requester wishes participant information to be included in the response.

caserequest:GetCaseRequestMessage.description: A message requesting a case from a court case management information system conforming to the parameter or parameters identified in the message.
